CheckTitle: Logstore data retention period is set to the recommended period (default 365 days)
Description: Ensure **Activity Log Retention** is set for **365 days** or greater.
Risk:
Logstore lifecycle controls how your activity log is exported and retained. It is recommended to retain your activity log for **365 days or more** to have time to respond to any incidents.

Short retention periods may result in loss of **forensic evidence** needed for security investigations.

Recommendation.Text:
1. Log on to the **SLS Console**
2. Find the project in the Projects section
3. Click **Modify** icon next to the Logstore
4. Modify the `Data Retention Period` to `365` or greater
